name: ng-library-starter
description: Angular library starter with AOT compilation, Codelyzer, Typescript, Webpack, Karma test, vendors dependency and SCSS compilation

scripts.build:aot: npm run rimraf -- dist/aot && npm run ngc -- --project tsconfig-aot.json
scripts.build:demo:esm:jit: npm run rimraf -- demos/esm/dist/jit && webpack --config demos/esm/webpack-jit.config.js
scripts.build:demo:esm:aot: rimraf demos/esm/compiled && npm run clean:demo:esm:aot && npm run ngc -- --project demos/esm/tsconfig-aot.json && webpack --config demos/esm/webpack-aot.config.js
scripts.build:demo:esm:aot-cli: npm run rimraf -- demos/esm/dist/aot && webpack --config demos/esm/webpack-aot.config.js --progress --colors --profile --bail --display-error-details
scripts.clean:demo:esm:aot: rimraf demos/esm/src/app/**/*.ngfactory.ts demos/esm/src/app/**/*.ngstyle.ts demos/esm/src/app/**/*.ngsummary.json demos/esm/compiled demos/esm/dist/aot
scripts.build:final:rollup: npm run rimraf -- final/umd && npm run rollup -- -c rollup-config-final.js
scripts.build:final:aot: npm run rimraf -- final/aot && npm run ngc -- --project tsconfig-esm-final.json
scripts.build:aot:webpack: npm run rimraf -- dist compiled && webpack --config webpack.aot.js --progress --colors --profile --bail
scripts.build:esm: npm run rimraf -- dist/esm && tsc --project tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.build:aot3: npm run rimraf -- aot && npm run ngc -- --project tsconfig-aot.json
scripts.build:rollup: npm run rimraf -- dist && npm run rollup -- -c rollup-config.js
scripts.clean: npm cache clean && npm run rimraf -- node_modules dist compiled doc documentation coverage
scripts.ci:travis: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Oleksii Trekhleb
